title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 103.5 - Equipment approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 103.5 - Equipment approval

State Regulations
(a) Lights. (1)

Any white headlight having intensity
sufficient to illuminate persons and objects for a distance of at least 200
feet directly ahead shall be approved for use on an ATV. (2)

Any red taillight which when illuminated
shall be visible from a distance of at least 400 feet from the rear is approved
for use on an ATV. (b) Protective helmet. Any protective helmet approved by the commissioner for use
on a motorcycle is also approved for use on an ATV. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
103.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
